short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QoL improvements for YouTube. Hides shorts and obtrusive shelves while searching and browsing YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improves the experience of browsing YouTube by hiding Shorts and shelves from YouTube. This results in less bloated searches filled with videos irrelevant to your search.

Main features:
-Hides shorts from appearing on the Home Page, Subscription Feed, searches, and channel pages.
-Hides various shelves from searches, such as: 'For You', 'Latest From', 'People Also Watched', 'Keep Watching', etc.
